text: The 1965 Giro di Lombardia cycling race took place on 16 October 1965, and was won by Peugeot-Michelin BP's Tom Simpson, becoming the first British winner. It was the 59th edition of the Giro di Lombardia "monument" classic race. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccccff;" ! !Cyclist !Team !Time |- |1 | |Peugeot-Michelin BP | align=right| 6h 47' 00" |- |2 | |Televizier | align=right| +3' 11" |- |3 | |Ford France-Gitane-Dunlop | align=right| s.t. |- |4 | |Filotex | align=right| s.t. |- |5 | |Molteni | align=right| s.t. |- |6 | |Mercier- Hutchinson-BP | align=right| s.t. |- |7 | |Molteni | align=right| s.t. |- |8 | |Ford France-Gitane-Lejeune | align=right| s.t. |- |9 | |Maino | align=right| s.t. |- |10 | |Pelforth- Sauvage-Lejeune | align=right| s.t. |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Giro di Lombardia Giro di Lombardia, 1965 Giro di Lombardia Category:1965 Super Prestige Pernod
